title: Social Learning-Based EdTech Integrated Education for Professionals in Their 40s

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and basic domain knowledge in professional fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: A social interaction learning model applying VR simulations in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can complete real-time collaborative projects with peers on social learning platforms at an 80%+ completion rate.
Learners successfully implement social problem-solving scenarios in VR-based simulation environments for specialized fields (medicine/law/technology) at least three times.

Over four weeks, learners will post case studies of edtech tool applications (including screenshots or videos) at least twice weekly on Padlet or Google Classroom via mobile devices, provide peer feedback (1 strength + 1 improvement suggestion) on three classmatesâ€™ posts, and engage in community activities. All posts must meet at least four of the five criteria in the institution-provided rubric.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
